Class MyRobot

  • Object
    • Robot

  • public class MyRobot
extends Robot
    Synthesizes keyboard input events.

      Creates a new MyRobot object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void keyPress​(int keycode)
      If the in-game chat is currently open, closes it, presses the given key, and re-opens it afterwards, restoring its previous state.

      • MyRobot

        public MyRobot​()
        throws AWTException
        Creates a new MyRobot object.
        Throws:
        AWTException - If the platform configuration does not allow low-level input control.

    • Method Detail

      • keyPress

        public void keyPress​(int keycode)
        If the in-game chat is currently open, closes it, presses the given key, and re-opens it afterwards, restoring its previous state. Otherwise, just presses the given key.
        Overrides:
        keyPress in class Robot
